title: Microsoft Extends Windows 10 Security Updates for One Year with New Enrollment Options
description: Microsoft on Tuesday announced that it's extending Windows 10 Extended Security Updates (ESU) for an extra year by letting users either pay a small fee of $30 or by sync their PC settings to the cloud.
